column5: My buddy and I are headed out after 12pm on Friday to do some fishin on Fri and Sat. We are stopping on the way up to Haliburton at lefroy to do some perch fishing. Any recommendations. We going to fish perch till dark and then head up and get a motel and get our last? musky trip in on Sat wher we are pretty sure of putting fish in the boat. Will have a report on Sunday but any tips for falll perch on Simcoe would be appreciated.
Check over on the Lake Simcoe fishing board- some recent Perch reports there. Seems like they are still in deeper- 27' of water.
